Akon Etim Eyakenyi (amuru 24 Februarị 1960 na Urue-Offong/Oruko, Nigeria ) bu onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria
Ọ bụ onye sinetọ ugbu a na-anọchi anya Akwa Ibom south senatorial district na steeti Akwa Ibom
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ sineti n'oge ntuliaka izugbe nke Naịjirịa na 2019
O jiri ngụkọta votu 122,412 merie
Tupu a họpụta ya na sineti ọ bụbu onye minista na-ahụ maka ala, ụlọ na mmepe obodo n'oge ọchịchị President Goodluck Ebele Jonathan
A mụrụ Eyakenyi n'afọ 1960 site n'ezinaụlọ Chief Uweh Isangedihi na Urue-Offong/Oruko local government area na Akwa Ibom State
N'afọ 1968 ọ gara ụlọ akwụkwọ Gọvernment Primary School, Uko Uyokim ebe ọ gụchara akwụkwọ ikike ịpụ akwụkwọ mbụ ya n'afọ 1974
N'afọ 1974 ọ debanyere aha na Collegelọ Akwụkwọ Ọzụzụ Ndị Nkụzi Methodist dị na Oron wee gụchaa akwụkwọ na Asambodo Nkuzi nke Abụọ na 1979.
Na 1983 Akon debara aha na Mahadum Calabar wee nye ya asambodo Naijiria na mmuta (NCE) na 1986
Na 1990, o nwetara nzere bachelọ nke Education (B.Ed) na Mahadum Calabar
O nwetakwara nzere Master of Education (M.Ed) na Dọkịta nke Nkà Ihe Ọmụma (Ph.D) na Ọmụmụ Ihe Ọmụmụ na 2010 na 2014 n'otu n'otu
Ọ lụọla di, nweekwa ụmụ na ụmụ ụmụ
Akon Eyakenyi malitere oru ya dika onye nkuzi mgbe ndi Cross River State Education Board họpụtara ya ka Mistress I & II ebe o jere ozi site na 1986 ruo 1993
Na 1991, mgbe ọ na-eje ozi dịka onye nkuzi a họpụtara ya onye nlekọta maka agụmakwụkwọ, ndị ntorobịa, egwuregwu na omenala na Oron
O mechara jee ozi na ministri agụmakwụkwọ Akwa Ibom steeti 1993 ruo 1999 dịka onye ọrụ mmụta
N'afọ 1999, a họpụtara ya ije ozi na bọọdụ agụmakwụkwọ steeti Akwa Ibom.
n'afo 2000, a họpụtara ya ka Kọmishọna maka ụlọ ọrụ, azụmahịa na njem nlegharị anya na Akwa Ibom State n'oge ọchịchị nke Victor Attah

N'afo 2013, Ọ bụ Godswill Akpabio họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onyeisi oche nke Akwa Ibom State Technical Schools Board.Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onyeisi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ruo mgbe Onye isi ala Goodluck Jonathan họpụtara ya dị ka Minista nke ala, ụlọ na mmepe obodo na 2014
N'afọ 2018, Eyakenyi kwuputara ebumnobi ya ịzọ ọkwa sinetị na ịnọchite anya senatorial District Akwa Ibom South
N'October 2018, o sonyere na pati primaries nke People's Democratic Party (Nigeria) iji nọchite anya senatorial Akwa Ibom South wee pụta onye meriri na primaries
Na 25 Febrụwarị 2019, e kwupụtara na ọ meriri na ntuliaka izugbe nke afọ 2019 iji nọchite anya Senator Akwa Ibom South
Àtụ:Nigerian Senators of the 9th National Assembly
